events.message: The applicant completed and submitted the personal loan application to cover upcoming medical expenses related to surgery.
Loan application was reviewed and categorised under Personal Loan due to applicant mentioning medical costs and treatment.
A loan officer was promptly assigned to manage the applicant’s personal loan case for medical-related funding.
The loan officer conducted an initial review of the documentation and applicant’s financial background.
A list of documents including medical bills, identification, and income verification was requested from the applicant.
Applicant provided all requested documents, including medical invoices and bank statements, for loan processing.
The credit check showed a strong payment history with no recent delinquencies or defaults, supporting loan approval.
Risk assessment was completed evaluating the applicant’s repayment capacity and medical loan purpose.
A personal loan offer with competitive interest rates and flexible repayment terms was presented to the applicant.
The applicant provided feedback requesting minor adjustments on repayment schedule and loan amount.
The application was escalated to senior loan officer to review applicant’s requested repayment modifications.
Senior management approved the personal loan according to the applicant’s requested terms after escalation.
Loan funds were successfully disbursed to the applicant’s bank account for payment of medical expenses.
A follow-up call was made to ensure the applicant received the funds and to provide guidance on repayment schedule.
The loan application case was officially closed after confirming all initial processes were completed successfully.
